name: 黃秀英
objective:
The course will focus on the fundamental theory and concept of "Engineering Optimization Methods", "Linear Programming", "Nonlinear Programming", "Multi-objective Function Optimization", "Modern Mathematical Planning Methods", and "Cross-Attribute System Optimization.".
(Taught in English)
